resources.string: Pending...The account is still in the air until 100% confirmed.
8 or more characters. Prefer a mix of letters, numbers & symbols

string.name: eos_tip_terms_of_service
string.u: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

resources.string: Password is very important. It\'s used to encrypt your wallets and other private data. You are responsible for saving your password carefully. Password can not be recovered if lost.
Password is very important. It\'s used to encrypt your wallets and other private data. You are responsible for saving your password carefully. Password can not be recovered if lost.
You can copy and paste the private key here, or scan a QR Code generated with private key.
Private key copied, Remember to clear the clipboard after use.
Are you being watched?\nPlease make sure backup under secured condition
Look out\nPlease import under secured condition
Got it. Show me the mnemonic
Got it. Show me the private key
Screenshots may be leak via photo album. You can backup under airplane mode.
Airplane mode preferred. Avoid transfer through internet to leak private key.
You can make a old mobile phone offline as a cold storage to scan QR Code then save the private key.
Otherwise, use a password manage software to save the private key with encryption. Remember to clear the clipboard once saved.
Please make sure to scan QR code under secured condition
It recommanded to use a device with camera to scan the QR Code to read private key offline
If some friend is an EOS master, you can give him / her private key to help you creating the account.
Enter wallet password to decrypt private key and view it
Recipient\'s name can not be same as sender\'s name
Delegate %1$s EOS for CPU, %2$s EOS for NET
Undelegate %1$s EOS for CPU, %2$s EOS for NET
Enter account password to authorize operation
Align Bar Code within frame to scan
Align QR Code within frame to scan
The private key is the identity of your assets. Please backup it as soon as possible. So you can recover your assets even accidents happened like phone lost, password forgotten, etc.
Please allow Gemma to access camera
Agree on Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Illegal character(s) found in account name
The length of account name should be 12
8 or more characters. Prefer a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
Please agree on Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
The account is still in the air until 100% confirmed.
Load nodes information fail，please check your network or switch nodes
Load available resource fail，please check your network or switch nodes
Load account information fail，please check your network or switch nodes
No resource available for vote，please delegate eos first
Acquiring RAM price fail，please check your network or switch nodes
Private Key format invalid，please check it
This wallet is already existed in Gemma
This transaction was sent by %1$s via GEMMA wallet. We invite you to install the app and join us for EOS era: https://wooko.ng
Please enter four decimal at most
You need to pay for resources like CPU, NET and RAM in order to activate your account

Please make sure to back up your private key, when your friend finishes the transfer, you will need to import the private key into Gemma once again to use your account. Account can not be restored if the private key was lost.

Please make sure to back up your private key, when your finish the transfer at any exchange that support memo, you will need to import the private key into Gemma once again to use your account. Account can not be restored if the private key was lost.
Please transfer in any exchange that support memo into smart code
and<font color = "#ff5500">use words followed as memo </font>，to finish creating.
Please let your friend transfer into smart code
and<font color = "#ff5500">use words followed as memo </font>，to finish creating.

string.name: eos_tip_use_eos_to_activate
string.Data: In order to create your account, please transfer at least<font color="#ff5500"> 2 EOS </font> ：your account will delegate <font color = "#426bd4"> 0.1 EOS</font> for CPU，<font color = "#ff5500"> 0.1 EOS</font> for NET， the remaining<font color="#ff5500"> 1.8 EOS </font>will be used for purchasing RAM at current price。

resources.string: The money will be refunded within 24 hours if you have paid
Due to EOS price change, the fee for creating this account turns into %1$s RMB
Please finish the payment in 10 minutes
Please enter your private key to verify
verifying if account name is usable
Create fail, the account name has been taken by another user
CPU and NET can not all be zero

The first wallet supports bluetooth hardware with fingerprints
Choose the WOOKONG Bio you want to connect.Please check your bluetooth and Bio\'s power if the device is not seen
8 or more characters. Prefer a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
请在WOOKONG Bio上按键以确认初始化
This WOOKONG Bio has not been initialized, please initialize it first
The Bluetooth is disconnected, please reconnect
Please input WOOKONG Bio password to authorize
Please check your bluetooth and Bio\'s power if the device is not seen
Please verify your fingerprint on WOOKONG Bio to authorize
Please press button on WOOKONG Bio to confirm transfer
Connect Fail. Please check your bluetooth and Bio\'s power.
Once format，WOOKONG Bio will clear the private key, please backup your mnemonic or transfer your asset before format
Please check your bluetooth and Bio\'s power is the device is not seen
The one who knows your mnemonic will have no limits to get access to your asset.Please write it down and save it in secure
Please write your mnemonic down and save it in secure

Mnemonic is used to restore wallet private key, when comes to restore wallet, like import a PC version EOS wallet, reinstall APP, lost of phone and forget your password, etc, please use your mnemonic to restore your private key.
Please click the mnemonic in the right order to verify it
Copy and paste mnemonic to input area, or use a QR code
Too many attempts, try again %1$d seconds later
The length of pattern is at least 4
Grant the following permissions to continue the program:\n\n%1$s
Please give us permission in the settings:\n\n%1$s
The user comes back from the settings page.
Your phone is not allowed us to install apps.
Your phone is not allowed us to draw on other applications.
Please check the external storage device.
请务必备份私钥，私钥掌管着数字资产的控制权及所有权。当意外发生时，这是唯一找回资产的途径。
